Wow! the Image Agency

TOP CORPORATE SERVICES

Image Check - Image for employees

Companies invest large amounts of money in their corporate identity but often miss employees as they do not communicate the CI developed by their management.

We work closely with your senior management to develop an image concept (from guidelines to complete dress codes) for your company and train your employees in dedicated workshops. We can also integrate the training units into Team-Buildings or other company events.

The objective is to create a professional and appropriate appearance for employees and senior management that not only represents every individual employee’s personal competence and qualities but also the company’s values.

Seminars, conferences, workshops

WOW! offers image content in various formats depending on your organization’s needs.

Whether it’s an informal chat with a small group of employees, a big conference for the whole organization or an intensive workshop to optimize a department’s image, we create customized agendas for your company, association, group, or school!

Here are a few workshop examples:

  • Corporate Identity: The employee as important ambassador of the CI
  • Carrier factor Image: How the right image can make you upwardly mobile
  • Success factor Image: How to look credible and reliable as a manager
  • Business Wardrobe: What you have to know
Uniform Consultancy

WOW! offers advice on uniforms for promoters, hostesses, receptionists, sales people and any particular position that needs to communicate a specific image with their work attire.

We will help you design a new uniform for your employees or modify an existent one always taking into consideration your corporate identity, the area of activity and your target group but also the functionality of the clothes and the comfort of your employees.

Customized Image Solutions

Ask us, we can help you with any image related project

THEY SAY

Recognition determines success

Some of our clients are top-class sponsors of big events such as the Uefa Euro2008. It is therefore very important for us that our promotors have an impeccable performance. WOW! The image Agency helped us to identify the trends for the summer 2008. They also assisted us in choosing the ideal materials, components and cuts to let our promoters look good and stay cool even after several hours working in the June’s heat.
Laura d’Elsa
Country Coordinator Austria - Sport AIM, Vienna

Valentina Drask
Group Managing Director - McCann, Eastern Europe
